com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Interface IComponentProxy<T extends IComponent>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type
    All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFixedComponentProxy<T>, IHorizontalComponentProxy<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClosableComponent, CollapsibleComponent, ComponentProxy, DraggableComponent, FixedComponent, FocusableComponentProxy, HorizontalComponent, HUDPanel, HUDPanel.HUDPanelComponent, PopupComponent, ResizableComponent, ScrollableComponent
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface IComponentProxy<T extends IComponent>
extends IComponent
    Proxy redirecting calls to other component.
